title: Indent String Formatting in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will dive into the indentString function in JavaScript. This function allows us to easily indent each line in a given string by a specified amount. With this function, we can format strings for better readability and organization in our code.

meta.title: JavaScript Indentation | String Formatting
meta.description: Learn how to use the indentString function in JavaScript to easily indent each line in a given string for better readability and organization in your code.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, indentString, string formatting, code formatting, readability

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
